_sText:
Just a small little idea I came up with:

What happens is there's a circle of metal rods surrounding this random floating ball. If you go within the circle of rods a laser will randomly shoot from the ball to one of the rods, then one to the next in a continuous circular motion each laser coming out .25 sec after the last until every rod has a laser shooting at it then a laser will shoot out the top and after .75 more sec. lightning shoots from the ground to the ball causing it to explode and kill everyone within a certain radius.

*Soon to come* After I figure out how to make the lasers rotate with the ball i will make a second version where it spins before it explodes and maybe but doubtedly even a third where it'll begin to spin and go in an upwards motion unveiling a secret room below it. 

*Note* The .rar contains both the .BSP and the .VMF so you may try it out without having to compile.

Here's a small video since the screenshots can't really capture what it does:


<object width="425" height="350"> <param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/eehQcnHImq0"> </param> <embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/eehQcnHImq0" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="425" height="350"> </embed> </object>

<font size=3> Enjoy!
